attributes.action: abolish the House of Lords and replace it with a democratically elected Upper Chamber of government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The House of Lords is composed of people who were not chosen by the electorate to run this country. 

Many of its members sit in its chamber just because they inherited a title from a parent. These people have considerable say over government policy without ever having had the need to demonstrate any talent in any given field whatsoever.

The Prime Minister should abolish the House of Lords and replace it with a democratically elected upper chamber of government.
